start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
-
Since 1970 Norman’s Tavern has been a North Beach institution. Located at 6770 Collins Ave on beautiful Miami Beach. We are a traditional sports bar, where you can find American food, a variety of beers and an exceptional atmosphere. We‘re open everyday of the year. Our menu features all the great American bar fare you might expect along with some unique additions. Steaks, wings, burgers and baby back ribs.
end Right About us image
end About us item
For mobile devices animate the about_v8 section on page load if the video is on the cover and this section is 1st or 2nd below the cover.
Events
Halloween
Friday October 31st
Bring your best costume and join us on Halloween!
Thanksgiving
Thursday November 27th
Bring your friends and family by on Thanksgiving Day for a celebratory feast!
Stop events carousel
Play events carousel
Happenings
Happenings
Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Aliaksandr T:
It's a wonderful place. Staff there are very caring and considerate. Food is so delicious. Huge portions. Cocktails are very nice. I would recommend this restaurant for all.
Review by - Yelp
Andres R:
Great food!! Kind staff and good vibes! Will come here again.they have pool tables, plenty of TVs and a great drink selection highly recommended
Review by - Yelp
Levi C:
Courteous,reliable and quick service.. the wait staff very friendly and professional.. also very clean..our family had a great experience at Norman's looking forward to go again
Review by - Yelp
Brian L:
I love Norman's in North Beach it's the best sports bar in the area. Great place to shoot darts have a game of pool and watch the game. I love the Saomon platter the dessert menu.
Review by - Yelp
Eric S:
First time here from Boston and the food is delicious and always fresh. My favorite thing on the menu is the Normans Burger! If you're in Miami you have to give this place a try!
Stop reviews carousel
Play reviews carousel
